data.description:
Get fit while rocking out to your favorite music. Shadow BoXR is a rhythm boxing game intended to make working out fun. With a massive library of community content music, you are sure to find what you love. Each song offers 7 different modes and difficulties for everyone this game is sure to knock your socks off.
Punch the targets and dodge the obstacles all while rocking out to your favorite music. This is your workout built by you for you.

changelog.change_log:
1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing an error to occur when trying to download custom songs.
	• Fixed bug causing songs to throw errors when containing certain special characters.
	• Fixed bug causing the in game timer to pause and not resume after pausing the game.
	• Fixed bug causing a three second delay when returning back to main menu.

1) Added count down timer after resuming gameplay.
2) Added an auto convert local songs folder named "ShadowBoXR-Songs" to files for easier converting of local songs. This is found at the root of your device or game installation location.
3) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed multiple bugs causing errors to be thrown sometimes when navigating community content.
	• Fixed bug causing re-downloading a song to throw errors.
	• Fixed bug causing an error to be thrown when trying to search your device for custom songs.
	• Fixed bug causing some saved data to corrupt and throw an error.

1) Added option to set default environment in player settings

3) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing available local MP3s to not display their name correcly sometimes.
	• Fixed bug causing the loading displays to sometimes throw an error when activated too quickly.
	• Fixed bug causing invalid game modes to display as an option causing further bugs when selected.
	• Fixed bug causing songs converted from MP3s to incorrectly compare to other songs resulting in unexpected results such as removing the wrong song from a playlist.
	• Fixed bug causing an error to be thrown when trying to determine players scores for a playlist sometimes.
	• Fixed bug causing some targets and obstacles to appear too closely together at the beginning of a song sometimes.
	• Fixed bug causing some users to experience songs not showing as available on the Convert Local Mp3s page.

1) Mp3 files stored in your downloads folder can now be automatically converted into Shadow BoXR supported songs.
	• The current implementation is powered by BeatSage and does require an active internet connection. This is primarily to improve in game performance and allow song conversion without interrupting gameplay.

3) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing sound settings and target FPS to revert to their default values upon startup.
	• Fixed bug causing the playlist maker tool to return an error sometimes when saving an empty list or causing it to say changes have been made when the list is empty.
	• Fixed bug causing community songs to sometimes throw an error when attempting to download a community song.
	• Fixed bug causing environment and game mode overrides to reset when playing a single song.
	• Fixed bug causing songs being previewed in the workout editing menu to continue to play after closing or moving to a different menu.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing some built in songs to throw an error when playing one handed mode.
	• Fixed bug causing community content search page to not work correctly sometimes.
	• Fixed bug previewing a custom song to sometimes throw an error.
	• Fixed bug causing some custom songs to fail to save due to "illegal" characters.
	• Temporarily disabled images in custom songs to fix a bug causing loading custom songs to sometimes get stuck.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing some built in songs to throw an error when playing one handed mode.
	• Fixed bug causing community content search page to not work correctly sometimes.
	• Fixed bug previewing a custom song to sometimes throw an error.
	• Fixed bug causing some custom songs to fail to save due to "illegal" characters.
	• Temporarily disabled images in custom songs to fix a bug causing loading custom songs to sometimes get stuck.

1) Reworked creating and editing playlists!
	• Re-ordered planels to improve editing and creating workflow. Panels are now, from left to right, Available Songs, Songs in Playlist, and Playlist Settings.
	• Moved customizing individual songs to the Songs in Playlists. Players can now just add the songs and then edit what has been added.
	• Added option to preview a song by selecting the play button for each song on Available Songs.
	• Playlists can now be re-ordered by clicking and dragging the song you want to edit.

2) More flow improvements!
	• Improved algorithm and changed how targets after a duck obtacle are handled.

3) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing viewing next page in community content to throw an error sometimes.
	• Fixed bug causing previewing communinty content song to throw an error sometimes.
	• Improved error reporting to give more detailed information.
	• Fixed bug causing community content search page to not work correctly sometimes.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing YUR watch to throw an error at the beginning of gameplay sometimes.
	• Set community content songs search field to only update once the full text has been entered and player selects to close the keyboard to reduce unnecessary bandwith use and improve performance and stability.
	• Fixed bug causing Shadow BoXR to fail to track if the game is in focus or not correctly.
	• Fixed bug causing community content songs to sometimes throw an error when trying to preview a song.

1)  Re-worked beatmaping algorithm to ensure a better flow and balanced workout. 
	• Directional targets will now always appear on the side opposite of the previous target allowing more fluid movement. 
	• Decreased maximum number of targest allowed on the same side ensuring both sides get a great workout!

2) Player stance now changes during songs!
	• Whenever a song is at least 1.55 minutes long, stance change events will occur.
	• Stance change events currently occur once every minute.
	• When a stance change event fires, the choreography will pause for 5 seconds during which time it will show the stance change indicator. 

3) Bug Fixes:
	• Improved handing of cancelled delayed events preventing errors to be logged with it is already being handled.
	• Fixed issue causing custom songs page to sometimes throw an error when trying to scroll due to a cancelled token.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing creating a playlist to fail when including the built in songs "Dance" or "Sky".
	• Fixed bug causing players to have to sign in to YUR every time they opened the game.
	• Fixed bug causing retrieving settings to sometimes break due to corrupted data.
	• Added an internal "Legacy" configuration for beat maps to fix a bug causing an error to be thrown when retrieving some custom songs.
	• Improved handling of errors when downloading songs fails. If connections time out, players will be given an option to try again.
	• Fixed bug causing "Latest" in community songs to not account for user search input.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed bug causing creating a playlist to fail when including the built in songs "Dance" or "Sky".
	• Fixed bug causing players to have to sign in to YUR every time they opened the game.
	• Fixed bug causing retrieving settings to sometimes break due to corrupted data.
	• Added an internal "Legacy" configuration for beat maps to fix a bug causing an error to be thrown when retrieving some custom songs.
	• Improved handling of errors when downloading songs fails. If connections time out, players will be given an option to try again.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed issue causing incomplete error logging
	• Fixed issue causing incorrectly saved data to break the game.
	• Improved YUR watch stability.
	• Fixed bug causing glove, target, and obstacle names to not display in some custom environments.
	• Fixed issue allowing players to edit the current environment when there isnt one set resulting in errors being thrown.

2) User experience improvements.
	• Added Song score display. Currently this only works on songs downloaded  this update or later however re-downloading existing songs will update them.

1) Bug Fixes:
	• Improved custom content page scrolling stability.
	• Fixed online scores displaying incorrectly.
	• Greatly improved custom song downloading.
	• Added additional precautions to prevent getting stuck on loading songs.

2) User experience improvements.
	• Added BPM, Recently Downloaded, and Song Score sorting options.
	• Updated scrollbars throughout UI to have the same look.
	• When Shadow BoXR encounters an error, it will now either prompt players to send error logs to 3PupperStudios LLC or if players have agreed to do so already, automatically send the logs.

1)  New stance option "Horsefoot". This option prompts a straight on pose. This allows dodge obstacles to appear on either side

2) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed issue causing pop ups to require selecting an option to close them.
	• Fixed issue causing playlists to not play delete correctly sometimes.

3) User experience improvements.
	• Beats per minute now displayed in song information.
	• Added "Resume button to settings menu in game.
	• Height calibration is now more straightforward.
	• Overall UI improvements

1)  Fixed bug causing the game to get into a locked state requiring players to restart the game when selecting a playlist created prior to version 0.1.32 using a custom environment created prior to 0.1.32. This was caused by an oversight in attempting to load the previous data resulting in unexpected results.

1)  Game mode overrides! Under the Game Mode Overrides section you can now disable obstacles, force jabs only, or force one handed mode.

2)  Passthrough mode in main menu can now be enabled in settings under the Player Settings tab!

2) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed issue causing the game to sometimes crash when trying to view a playlist. (Note Custom Environments and Workouts will need to have their environment overrides re-set. Unfortunately this system required a rework and is incompatible with previous versions.)
	• Fixed issue preventing playlist records from being displayed.
	• Fixed issue sometimes causing custom environments to cause the game to fail to load.
	• Fixed issue causing the black fog of profile selection to always be active or to activate when returning from a workout.
	• Removed unnecessary webcalls to reduce data usage.

3) User experience improvements.
	• Improved play button visuals and visibility.
	• Confirmation now requested when deleting playlists.

1) Gloves, targets, and obstacles are no longer locked per environment and custom sets can be set when creating a custom environment, playlist, or just selecting individual songs.

2) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed issue sometimes requiring both pointers to be pointed at a scroll view in order to scroll via joysticks.
	• Fixed issue causing profile options to randomize every time.

3) User experience improvements.
	• If player only has one profile, it is now automatically selected to streamline user experience.
	• Player is greeted on home screen now and given the option to change their profile by selecting their icon.

1) Players can now opt in to participate in online leaderboards that will record their best score. Each leaderboard is specific to a specific song, in a specific game mode, at a specific difficulty just like local leaderboards. 

2) Bug Fixes:
	• Fixed issue causing some devices to not work
	• Fixed issue causing profiles to sometimes create duplicates

1) Players can now play songs directly after downloading them from the same page as well delete them.

2) A song progress display now shows players the progress of the active song using a background that fills as it progresses.

3) Bug Fixes:
	•Custom backgrounds are now able to load from the quick play home screen play button.
	•Selecting or changing forward foot works correctly when selected from playlists now
	•Dark waters visual improvements.

1) Players can now create custom environments with custom skyboxes. Currently this is limited to only custom skyboxes. Currently custom skyboxes are limited to .Png, .Jpg, and .Jpeg pictures.  Create new environments under custom content.  Images are searched for in the downloads folder.  Simply download the image you want and select to add new skyboxes!

2) Community content loading screen improved. Now simply disables the view and does not block the option select to listen, download, or home button.
